entities.name: wizard
entities.description: The wizard is described as sitting at a desk and twiddling his thumbs, watching the door. He has a feeble voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking around the office and being invisible to people from fifty years ago.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes, the phoenix, is mentioned as not being present in the office.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as not being the Headmaster.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is described as a boy of about sixteen with jet-black hair and a silver Prefect's badge.

entities.name: dippet
entities.description: Dippet is described as the Headmaster who reads letters from students.

relationships.description: Riddle is addressed by Dippet, indicating that Riddle is a student under Dippet's headmastership.
Harry is compared to Riddle in terms of their age and appearance.
